attributes.action: We demand a written constitution before Brexit
attributes.additional_details: We demand that it should be written by University Law Professors & that no politicians or organs of the state, especially Judges, or any church have any part in it's writing (but may be consulted on request)
attributes.background: We demand a written constitution before leaving the jurisdiction of The European Court of Human Rights to protect ourselves from oppressive government

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

The UK is not leaving the jurisdiction of the European Court of Human Rights as part of the Brexit process.

We are therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
